mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO rd_app_order( id, orderId, channelId, ckChannelId, ckAppId, mmAppId, rdAppId, isOnline, payType, ackType, payCount, sid, cid, price, imsi, feetype, paycode, resulttime, hRet, uniqueid, cpparam, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{channelid}, #{ckChannelId}, #{ckAppId}, #{mmAppId}, #{rdAppId}, #{isOnline}, #{payType}, #{ackType}, #{payCount}, #{sid}, #{cid}, #{price}, #{imsi}, #{feetype}, #{paycode}, #{resulttime}, #{hRet}, #{uniqueid}, #{cpparam}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
